raw_body: DE ZILVA – DARREL. “At rest with the Lord”. Husband of late Ingrid De Zilva (nee Siriwardana), loving father of Darine and late Darren, father-in-law of Shiral Fernando, loving grandfather to Shenal and Shenaya, brother of Iona Van Ran Zow and Yvette Baldsing. The remains will lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour on Tuesday, 2nd April from 10.00 a.m. onwards.
